ipTracker.title: IP Tracker App
ipTracker.description: Tracks the IP Address or Domain Name inserted by fetching data from Ipify API and placed a markup on its location using the coordinates provided, and a global map provided by Leaflet.

toDoApp.title: ToDo App
toDoApp.description: Manage your daiy tasks by creating, marking as active or completed, filtering and deleting ToDo's. This app features fetching from LocalStorage and multiple tabs synchronization.

countryQuiz.title: Country Quiz
countryQuiz.description: Fetches the data it needs from the REST Countries API. It chooses a question and a country, three thinkfully wrong options and the correct one among the others. It contains a timer and a correct counter.
